Package ohos.agp.render.render3d

Interface SceneNode


  • public interface SceneNode
    Provides scene nodes representing entities in a scene.

    A scene node object can represent an entity that belongs to a node hierarchy.

    Since:
    3

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName​()
        Obtains the name of a node.
        Returns:
        Returns the name of the node. The value cannot be null.

      • setName

        void setName​(String name)
        Sets the name of a node.
        Parameters:
        name - Indicates the name of the node.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if the name of the node is null.

      • getScene

        Scene getScene​()
        Obtains the scene to which a node belongs.
        Returns:
        Returns the scene to which the node belongs.

      • getParent

        Optional<SceneNode> getParent​()
        Obtains the parent node of a specified node.
        Returns:
        Returns the parent node of the specified node except the root node.

      • setParent

        void setParent​(SceneNode parentNode)
        Sets the parent node for a node.
        Parameters:
        parentNode - Indicates the parent node to set.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if the parameter is null.

      • getPosition

        Vector3 getPosition​()
        Obtains the position of the transformation component in a node.
        Returns:
        Returns the position of the transformation component in the local coordinate system.

      • setPosition

        void setPosition​(Vector3 position)
        Sets the position of the transformation component in a node.
        Parameters:
        position - Indicates the position of the transformation component in the local coordinate system.

      • getRotation

        Quaternion getRotation​()
        Obtains the rotation part of the transformation component in a node.
        Returns:
        Returns the rotation part of the transformation component in the local coordinate system.

      • setRotation

        void setRotation​(Quaternion rotation)
        Sets the rotation part of the transformation component in a node.
        Parameters:
        rotation - Indicates the rotation part of the transformation component in the local coordinate system.

      • getScale

        Vector3 getScale​()
        Obtains the scaling part of the transformation component in a node.
        Returns:
        Returns the scaling part of the transformation component in the local coordinate system.

      • setScale

        void setScale​(Vector3 scale)
        Sets the scaling part of the transformation component in a node.
        Parameters:
        scale - Indicates the scaling part of the transformation component in the local coordinate system.

      • setEnabled

        void setEnabled​(boolean isEnabled)
        Sets whether to enable a node. When a node is disabled, the rendering of this node and all its child nodes will stop.
        Parameters:
        isEnabled - Indicates whether the node is enabled.

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled​()
        Obtains the state of a node.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the node is enabled; returns false otherwise.

      • setExported

        void setExported​(boolean isExported)
        Sets whether to export a node.
        Parameters:
        isExported - Indicates whether to export the node.

      • isExported

        boolean isExported​()
        Obtains whether a node is exported.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the node is exported; returns false otherwise.

      • getChildren

        List<SceneNode> getChildren​()
        Obtains the list of child nodes of a node.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of child nodes if any; returns null otherwise.

      • isAncestorOf

        boolean isAncestorOf​(SceneNode node)
        Checks whether a node is the ancestor (parent or grandparent node) of another node.
        Parameters:
        node - Indicates the node to check.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the checked node is the ancestor of the specified node; returns false otherwise.

      • getChild

        Optional<SceneNode> getChild​(String name)
        Obtains a child node based on the name.
        Parameters:
        name - Indicates the name of the child node to query.
        Returns:
        Returns the found node if any; returns null otherwise.

      • lookupNodeByPath

        Optional<SceneNode> lookupNodeByPath​(String path)
        Searches for a node based on the path name consisting of node names.
        Parameters:
        path - Indicates the complete path for accessing the node. For example, parentNode/childNode/grandChild.
        Returns:
        Returns the found node if any; returns null otherwise.

      • lookupNodeByName

        Optional<SceneNode> lookupNodeByName​(String name)
        Recursively searches for a node based on the name. The first node assigned with the specified name is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - Indicates the name of the node.
        Returns:
        Returns the found node if any; returns null otherwise.

      • lookupNodeByComponent

        Optional<SceneNode> lookupNodeByComponent​(Class<? extends Component> componentType)
        Recursively searches for a node based on the component type. The first node assigned with the specified component is returned.
        Parameters:
        componentType - Indicates the component type.
        Returns:
        Returns the found node if any; returns null otherwise.

      • lookupNodesByComponent

        List<SceneNode> lookupNodesByComponent​(Class<? extends Component> componentType)
        Recursively searches for multiple nodes in each hierarchy based on the component type. All nodes assigned with the specified component are returned.
        Parameters:
        componentType - Indicates the component type.
        Returns:
        Returns the found nodes if any; returns null otherwise.

      • getEntity

        Entity getEntity​()
        Obtains the entity reference of a node.
        Returns:
        Returns the entity reference of the node.
